cpu.h File Reference
CSL ARCH Module » A15 » CPU

This file contains the API prototypes for configuring CPU. More...

#include <stdint.h>

Functions

void CPUSwitchToUserMode (void)
 This API can be used to switch from any previleged mode of ARM to user mode. After this API is called, the program will continue to operate in non-privileged mode, until any exception occurs. After the exception is serviced, execution will continue in user mode. More...
 
void CPUSwitchToPrivilegedMode (void)
 This API can be used to switch from user mode to privileged mode The priviledge mode will be system mode. System mode will share the same resources as user mode, but with privileges. More...
 
void CPUAbortHandler (void)
 This API is called when the CPU is aborted Both IRQ and FIQ will be disabled when the CPU gets an abort and calls this API. More...
 
void CPUirqd (void)
 Wrapper function for the IRQ disable function. More...
 
void CPUirqe (void)
 Wrapper function for the IRQ enable function. More...
 
void CPUfiqd (void)
 Wrapper function for the FIQ disable function. More...
 
void CPUfiqe (void)
 Wrapper function for the FIQ enable function. More...
 
void CPUSendEvent (void)
 Wrapper function to send event to all cores in the cluster. More...
 
void CPUDisableCPSRABit (void)
 Wrapper function to disable CPSR A-Bit which enables Abort interupts. More...
 
uint32_t CPUIntStatus (void)
 Wrapper function for the IRQ status. More...
